name: Adhithyan
comment: Another remarkable aspect was the placement support provided by IAT Technologies. Their guidance and assistance in resume building, mock interviews helped a lot.

name: Gugan S
comment: It is with great pleasure that we extend our warmest greetings to IAT TECHNOLOGIES. Your commitment to excellence in education and innovation is truly inspiring.

name: Vishnu K
comment: The infrastructure is well-equipped, providing a great learning environment. What stood out the most was their interview preparation training.

name: Shankar
comment: I recently attended the job fair at MGR University, organized by IAT Technologies, and I am happy to share that I received an offer from an IT company with good package.

name: Parthasarathy
comment: Thanks to IAT Technologies Guindy, I now have a solid understanding of Python and web app development. The course was engaging, and the trainers were fantastic.

name: Gowsalya Selvaraju
comment: I highly recommend IAT Technologies to anyone looking for top-notch training and placement opportunities in the IT industry. A big thanks to the entire team.
